feed.title: Google Cloud: Agent Assist
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Agent Assist

entry.content: Agent assist offers AI coach in GA. AI coach automatically suggests responses to an agent during a customer service conversation. AI coach is available in all Google Cloud languages and regions.
entry.summary: Agent Assist now offers AI Coach in General Availability. This feature automatically suggests responses to agents during customer service conversations and is available in all Google Cloud languages and regions.
entry.title: Feature: AI Coach Now Generally Available

entry.content: OpenAPI and Integration Connectors tools are generally available in Agent Assist. Google Cloud enables the use of this external API and data source to improve Agent Assist integrations.
entry.summary: OpenAPI and Integration Connectors tools are now generally available in Agent Assist. This allows for the use of external APIs and data sources to enhance Agent Assist integrations.
entry.title: Feature: OpenAPI and Integration Connectors are Generally Available

entry.content:
Agent Assist offers the following functions in addition to generative knowledge assist features:

  • Apply document and safety filters.
  • Configure Pub/Sub notifications for empty suggestions.
  • Troubleshoot knowledge assist features.
entry.summary: Explore the latest enhancements to Agent Assist, including document and safety filters, Pub/Sub notifications for empty suggestions, and troubleshooting for knowledge assist features.
entry.title: Feature: Agent Assist New Features

entry.content: Smart compose is no longer in use and will be permanently removed in October 2025. Refer to Generative smart reply for an alternative.
entry.summary: Smart compose is deprecated and will be removed in October 2025. Consider using generative smart reply as an alternative.
entry.title: Deprecated: Smart compose deprecated

entry.content:
Agent Assist offers summarization automatic evaluation in GA. This feature evaluates the quality of AI-generated summaries based on accuracy, completeness, and adherence. Summarization autoevaluation is available in the following regions:

  • us-central1
  • us-west1
  • global
entry.summary: Agent Assist now offers automatic summarization evaluation in General Availability. This feature assesses the quality of AI-generated summaries for accuracy, completeness, and adherence, with support in us-central1, us-west1, and global regions.
entry.title: Feature: Agent Assist Automatic Summarization Evaluation Now in GA

entry.content: Agent Assist offers a bidirectional API for next-generation audio and multi-modal experiences in both Conversational Agents and Agent Assist. The BiDiStreamingAnalyzeContent API facilitates the streaming of audio data and returns either transcripts or human agent suggestions to you.
entry.summary: A new bidirectional API is available for Agent Assist that supports audio and multi-modal features.
entry.title: Feature: Agent Assist API

entry.content:
Agent assist offers summarization automatic evaluation in preview. This feature evaluates the quality of AI-generated summaries based on the following three metrics:

  • Accuracy
  • Completeness
  • Adherence
entry.summary: Agent assist now offers summarization evaluation in preview, assessing AI-generated summaries on accuracy, completeness, and adherence.
entry.title: Feature: Agent assist summarization evaluation

entry.content: Article suggestion and FAQ Assist are no longer in use and you can't create new conversation profiles for them. These two features will be permanently removed on March 1, 2026. Refer to Generative knowledge assist for an alternative.
entry.summary: Article suggestion and FAQ Assist are deprecated. They will be removed on March 1, 2026. Generative knowledge assist is the alternative.
entry.title: Deprecated: Deprecated Features

entry.content: Agent Assist offers the Twilio UI module V3. This version provides an upgraded integration.
entry.summary: This is a short summary for a title.
entry.title: Feature: Twilio UI module V3 Upgrade

entry.content: Google Cloud provides quotas for using Agent Assist APIs. Each feature uses specific APIs, which have their own quotas.
entry.title: Changed: Agent Assist Quotas

entry.content: Agent Assist offers Summarization with custom sections V4.0 in GA. V4.0 uses gemini-2.0-flash and supports a concise summary for situation and action.
entry.summary: Agent Assist now supports summarization with custom sections V4.0 in GA.
entry.title: Feature: New Feature: Agent Assist Summarization
